dialogue.quote: "Hey, it's ok I don't like him better than YOU!"

"Well, Voldemort came and the fucking bastard told me to fucking kill Harry! But I don't want to kill him, because, he's really nice, even if he did go out with Draco. But if I don't kill Harry, then Voldemort, will fucking kill Draco!"

"When Voldemint was in Hogwarts before he became powerful he gut his hearth borken. Now do you fink he would still become Volxemort if he was in love?"
"U must go back in time and sedouce him. It is the only way. If he is still evil then you must kill him. You can come to my room tomorrow and you can do it."
"Ok now you're going to go back in tim."
"U will have to do it in a few sessionz."
"hey dis is my classroom wait wtf enoby what da hell r u doing?"
"omfg enoby... I think im addicted to Voldemortserum."
"Lizzen Egogy, I need ur help. Nex tim u go bak in tim, do u fink u kod ask Tom Andorson 4 sum help?"
"Enoby, you will have to do anozzer session now. Also I need u to get me da cure 4 being adikited."
"OMFS, letz have a groop kutting session!11"
"No Draco told me he wood be watching Hoes of Wax."
"He duzzn't know dat ur better. Anyway da norse said u could get up. Cum on!1"
"No Draco told me he wood be watching Hoes of Wax."
"He duzzn't know dat ur better. Anyway da norse said u could get up. Cum on!1"
"Ebony I was so worried abott u but I know you can't fucking die because you're a vrompire. Snape came back because that girl Britney freed him. I never liked her she was a bad student."
"Yes they are on the loose at this school. Dumblydore is back Cornelia is on his way to help evry1. Tell evry1 u see to lock themselves in their conman room!"
"I dunno why but I know he almost tried 2 commit suicide after he saw u almost kill urself."
"EXCUS ME! EXCUS ME WHO SED DAT!"
"Filth is der any1 unda da cloak!"
"Dam, this job would be great if it wasn't 4 da fukking students!"
"Xcuze me but u r going 2 have 2 leave!111"
